revisionDesc.change: automated clean-up and final check of file
removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: Will you be good enough to send me, at your earliest convenience, the opinion and the briefs in the case of the barque "John Griffin," appealed from the Circuit Court of your District? The case will be reached very early in the term.
